channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-1254] jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-352 rest and soap quickstart install fail if deployed one after another
item.description:
The rest, soap, secure-rest, and secure-soap quickstarts all work properly if installed separately. However, If I install one after another, I get "org.osgi.framework.BundleException: Bundle symbolic name and version are not unique: jboss-fuse-full:6.1.0.redhat-352"

Here is the output when I tried to install secure-soap after installing soap.

JBossFuse:karaf@root> osgi:install -s mvn:org.jboss.quickstarts.fuse/secure-soap/6.1.0.redhat-352
Bundle IDs:
Error executing command: Error installing bundles:
Unable to install bundle mvn:org.jboss.quickstarts.fuse/secure-soap/6.1.0.redhat-352
JBossFuse:karaf@root> log:display

item.summary: jboss-fuse-6.1.0.redhat-352 rest and soap quickstart install fail if deployed one after another

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
